name: Apple
Desc: A sweet, crisp fruit rich in fiber and antioxidants. Often enjoyed fresh or in desserts.

name: Mango
Desc: A juicy tropical fruit with a rich, sweet flavor. Known as the 'king of fruits.'

name: Grapes
Desc: Small, juicy fruits that grow in clusters and come in many colors. Eaten fresh or used in juices.
Benefits: Supports brain health, rich in antioxidants.

name: Orange
Desc: A citrus fruit known for its tangy taste and vitamin C content. Often used in juices and snacks.

name: Banana
Desc: A soft, sweet fruit that's high in potassium. Commonly eaten raw or added to smoothies.

name: Papaya
Desc: A tropical fruit with orange flesh and black seeds. Mildly sweet and soft in texture.
